Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Enacts the statewide transportation authority reinvestment (STAR) act
Summary: Enacts the statewide transportation authority reinvestment (STAR) act; exempts mass transit authorities from bond issuance charges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to exempting mass transit authorities from bond issuance charges
